entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:31 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
